app.Name: Refraction
app.Title: Wave Refractions
app.Author: Hailey Johnson
app.Description: This model demonstrates the evolution of wave rays over nearshore bathymetry.

app.Name: SedTrans
app.Title: Sediment Transport
app.Author: Hailey Johnson
app.Description: This model shows the potential for alongshore sediment transport potential and gradients as a function of wave angle and height.

app.Name: Profiles
app.Title: Equilibrium Beach Profiles
app.Author: Hailey Johnson
app.Description: This model animates the evolution of an equilibrium beach profiles as it adjusts to changes in sea level, according to Bruun's rule.

app.Name: Cliffs
app.Title: Sea Cliff Retreat
app.Author: Hailey Johnson
app.Description: This model animates the process of sea cliff retreat due to wave action and notch erosion.
